title: Riots latest champions ARE SO GOOD
body:
A Toad that can build full tank and still burst a bruiser while being unkillable. 

Illaoi, the bruiser with no cc and almost zero mobility and 1 second wind ups on all of her abilities. 

Kindred an absolutely cancerous champion that you can never actually beat 1v1 because even if you win she just ults and knocks you down to 10% hp and then either runs or finishes you off.

Can't wait to see what else they have in store.

Btw this is sarcasm, all of these champions are fking disgusting and should all be deleted. 

Literally, cannot handle this sht, invulnerability ultimate's are all cancerous and always create balance issues, e.g Kayle.

 Tahm, I don't even know what to say, how did this thing make it to live.

 As for illaoi, who the fk thought an almost zero mobility/zero cc bruiser would do any good in this game ever, this champion is going to be urgot tier forever, and if this game is still going in two years probably be reworked.

replies.body: kindred isnt strong, quite easy to kill actually, she sut has time to plan the fight out while she ults while the other person just wants to kill her, so they get outplayed, tahm is easy to kill if you can cc him enough, or just get a bork and illaoi does quite a lot in fights, her ulti makes or breaks teamfights so hard.

Where did I say Kindred is strong?

Her ultimate is fking annoying and anti fun, while not strong or overpowered or even weak, just fking annoying. Like does anyone like Kayle? Does anyone appreciate kayles existence in this game? I've seen challenger players ban Kindred just becasue she's so fking annoying to deal with.

Tahm is just disgusting, he is broken, like not saying overpowered or under powered just straight broken, as I said before I don't know how this made it to live, it is so fking obnoxious in top lane, or any role really. like he barely offers anything yet he's payed top lane because he's just so fking annoying. and his just genuinley a pain to a deal with an will just end up poking and diving 90% of top laners while just ignoring their dmg/towers dmg with his two hp bars. forcing someone to come and deal with this fking abomination of a champion.

And illaoi, I mean this champion is just so useless, she has a small niche against melee champions, anything ranged is jsut going to destroy her, she can cheese some melee champions but against a competent opponent she's pretty well useless.

I actually killed kindred with {{champion:6}}  spport in a game not long ago.

She popped Ult, I popped noxian c charge took a bit of damage and landed a couple of autos, stood back  a bit she left her Ult by a fraction to try and land something, acid Hunter with tlords decree , dead 

Plz don't knock the crab if you've never played him.
